publications: [{"title":"LED Technology Based Low Cost Electronic Security","subtitle":"Texas Instruments India University Forum","date":"Apr 2011","description":"Innovated a completely new hardware module for robust line of sight data communication using LEDs that is 10 times cheaper than existing technologies, with no compromise on speed and performance."}]
